title: Legend of Zelda Tears of the Kingdom
description: In this sequel to the Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild game, you’ll decide your own path through the sprawling landscapes of Hyrule and the mysterious islands floating in the vast skies above. Can you harness the power of Link’s new abilities to fight back against the malevolent forces that threaten the kingdom?
similar_games: Legend of Zelda Breath of the Wild
games_by_developers: Legend of Zelda Breath of the Wild
awards: Game Award for Most Anticpated Game of the Year

title: Legend of Zelda Breath of the Wild
description: Open-world action-adventure game that redefines the traditional Zelda experience while staying true to the series' core elements. Set in the vast kingdom of Hyrule, players step into the shoes of Link, who awakens from a deep slumber to find a world in ruins, plagued by the malevolent force known as Calamity Ganon.

games_by_developers: Legend of Zelda Tears of the Kingdom
awards: The Game Award for Game of the Year

The Game Award for Best Game Direction

title: Genshin Impact
description: Open-world action role-playing game set in the fantastical world of Teyvat, where players embark on an epic journey as the Traveler, seeking to unravel the mysteries of this sprawling land and reunite with their lost sibling.
